quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who is always there for you, through thick and thin.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another, 'What! You too? I thought I was the only one.'
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Friendship is the only cement that will ever hold the world together.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Friendship is the golden thread that ties the heart of all the world.
quotes.author: John Evelyn

quotes.quote: A true friend is the greatest of all blessings.
quotes.author: François de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Friendship is the inexpressible comfort of feeling safe with a person, having neither to weigh thoughts nor measure words.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: A friend is one who overlooks your broken fence and admires the flowers in your garden.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is the only thing in the world that is worth more than gold.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who is always honest and trustworthy, even when it's hard.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.quote: Friendship is like a rainbow between two hearts.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who knows the song in your heart and can sing it back to you when you have forgotten the words.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who is always there to lift you up when you are down.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is the only flower that blooms in all seasons.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: Friendship is the greatest gift you can give someone.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who is always by your side, no matter what.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is the sweetest form of love.
quotes.author: Cynthia Hand

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who understands your past, believes in your future, and accepts you just the way you are.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is the only ship that never sinks.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who makes you feel better, even on your worst days.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is a sheltering tree.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who can see the truth and pain in you even when you are fooling everyone else.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is like a star that twinkles even in the darkest night.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
quotes.author: Christian D. Larson

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The harder I work, the luckier I get.
quotes.author: Gary Player

quotes.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The future depends on what you do today.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself, take on your challenges, dig deep within yourself to conquer fears. Never let anyone bring you down. You got this.
quotes.author: Chantal Sutherland

quotes.quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
quotes.author: Norman Vaughan

quotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
quotes.author: Colin R. Davis

quotes.quote: Success is not just about making money. It's about making a difference.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: Success is not the absence of failure; it's the persistence through failure.
quotes.author: Aisha Tyler

quotes.quote: Success is not about being the best. It's about always getting better.
quotes.author: Behance

quotes.quote: Success is not a destination, but the road that you're on. Being successful means that you're working hard and walking your walk every day. You can only live your dream by working hard towards it. That's living your dream.
quotes.author: Marlon Wayans

quotes.quote: The secret of success is to know something nobody else knows.
quotes.author: Aristotle Onassis

quotes.quote: Success is not just about making money. It's about making a difference.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: The secret to success is to know something nobody else knows.
quotes.author: Aristotle Onassis

quotes.quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Success is not just about making money. It's about making a difference.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The harder I work, the luckier I get.
quotes.author: Gary Player

quotes.quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Success is not the absence of failure; it's the persistence through failure.
quotes.author: Aisha Tyler

quotes.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: The secret of success is to know something nobody else knows.
quotes.author: Aristotle Onassis

quotes.quote: Success is not just about making money. It's about making a difference.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Self-respect is the fruit of discipline; the sense of dignity grows with the ability to say no to oneself.
quotes.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quotes.quote: To free us from the expectations of others, to give us back to ourselves - there lies the great, singular power of self-respect.
quotes.author: Joan Didion

quotes.quote: Respect yourself and others will respect you.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The most powerful relationship you will ever have is the relationship with yourself.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Self-respect is the cornerstone of all virtue.
quotes.author: John Herschel

quotes.quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Respect yourself enough to walk away from anything that no longer serves you, grows you, or makes you happy.
quotes.author: Robert Tew

quotes.quote: Self-respect is a question of recognizing that anything worth having has a price.
quotes.author: Joan Didion

quotes.quote: To be beautiful means to be yourself. You don't need to be accepted by others. You need to accept yourself.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: The better you feel about yourself, the less you feel the need to show off.
quotes.author: Robert Hand

quotes.quote: Self-respect knows no considerations.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Self-respect is the root of discipline: The sense of dignity grows with the ability to say no to oneself.
quotes.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quotes.quote: Respect yourself enough to know you deserve the very best.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Don't let the noise of others' opinions drown out your own inner voice.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Your value doesn't decrease based on someone's inability to see your worth.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Self-respect is a vibe. Once you understand your worth, you'll only entertain vibes that match it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When you're different, sometimes you don't see the millions of people who accept you for what you are. All you notice is the person who doesn't.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Respect yourself enough to walk away from anything that no longer serves you, grows you, or makes you happy.
quotes.author: Robert Tew

quotes.quote: The moment you give up your principles, and your values, you are dead, your culture is dead, your civilization is dead. Period.
quotes.author: Oriana Fallaci

quotes.quote: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Respect yourself enough to walk away from anything that no longer serves you, grows you, or makes you happy.
quotes.author: Robert Tew

quotes.quote: I care for myself. The more solitary, the more friendless, the more unsustained I am, the more I will respect myself.
quotes.author: Charlotte Brontë

quotes.quote: Self-respect cannot be hunted. It cannot be purchased. It is never for sale. It cannot be fabricated out of public relations. It comes to us when we are alone, in quiet moments, in quiet places, when we suddenly realize that, knowing the good, we have done it; knowing the beautiful, we have served it; knowing the truth, we have spoken it.
quotes.author: Whitney Griswold

quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.

quotes.quote: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.

quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

quotes.quote: Knowledge is power.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Knowledge is like a garden; if it is not cultivated, it cannot be harvested.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The only source of knowledge is experience.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The greatest enemy of knowledge is not ignorance, it is the illusion of knowledge.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: Knowledge is love and light and vision.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: The more knowledge you have, the greater will be your fear of ignorance.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Knowledge is not power. Implementation of knowledge is power.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Knowledge is the food of the soul.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: To know that we know what we know, and to know that we do not know what we do not know, that is true knowledge.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Knowledge will bring you the opportunity to make a difference.
quotes.author: Claire Fagin

quotes.quote: The goal of education is not to increase the amount of knowledge but to create the possibilities for a child to invent and discover, to create men who are capable of doing new things.
quotes.author: Jean Piaget

quotes.quote: Knowledge is the only instrument of production that is not subject to diminishing returns.
quotes.author: J.M. Keynes

quotes.quote: Knowledge which is acquired under compulsion obtains no hold on the mind.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Knowledge is a treasure, but practice is the key to it.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Knowledge is power, but enthusiasm pulls the switch.
quotes.author: Ivern Ball

quotes.quote: The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The only thing that interferes with my learning is my education.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Knowledge is of no value unless you put it into practice.

quotes.quote: Science is organized knowledge. Wisdom is organized life.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: The only good is knowledge and the only evil is ignorance.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Knowledge is a process of piling up facts; wisdom lies in their simplification.
